about_the_game:
This is a through the martial arts style game, the protagonist is in a heart of justice of the youth, in the modern times he and his classmates and friends suffer from bullying, in an accident fell into the ancient well, inadvertently opened the door of time and space, through to the ancient...
Through this time and space gate, you get the spiritual power, through the exercise has a certain amount of force, during this period encountered many strange monsters in the Sutra of Mountains and Seas.
  • You can control a character into a time of delirium, you can fight monsters to upgrade the character attributes, upgrade can expand health, soul power, force.
  • Pick up food, gold, and scrolls to level up and increase health, spiritual strength, and strength.
  • Weapons automatically grow with your abilities, and weapons can also be upgraded.
  • Through constant exploration, you finally unravel the mysteries of time and space, and can travel between modern and ancient times.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language and extreme violence.
